title: Ethiopian Wilted Spinach with Cottage Cheese
ingredients: ['450g cottage cheese', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1/8 teaspoon ground cloves', '2 tablespoons butter', '4 tablespoons finely chopped onion', '1 tablespoon minced fresh root ginger', '1 green chilli, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '900g spinach leaves, roughly chopped']
